ul.li: ** Documentation ** of the Lule Sámi rule file: gt/smj/src/twol-smj.txt

** Documentation ** of the Lule Sámi lexicon files
continuation lexica for N, A, V: gt/smj/src/smj-lex.txt,
nouns: gt/smj/src/noun-smj-lex.txt,
verbs: gt/smj/src/verb-smj-lex.txt,
adjectives: gt/smj/src/adj-smj-lex.txt,
adverbs: gt/smj/src/adv-smj-lex.txt,
adpositions: gt/smj/src/pp-smj-lex.txt,
closed parts of speech: gt/smj/src/closed-smj-lex.txt.

** Documentation ** on the preprocessor files
the preprocessor: gt/smj/src/tok.txt,
the file that allows mixing æ/ä and ø/ö: gt/smj/src/spellrelax.regex,
the file for initial capitalisation: gt/smj/src/case.regex,
the file for words written in all-caps: gt/smj/src/allcaps.regex and
the lookup script: gt/smj/src/cap-smj.
The Lule Sámi gt/smj/src/Makefile (cf. the documentation of the sme Makefile.
